subject: RE: [junit] [OT] coverage plugins for eclipse?
msgSnippet: ... I d rather see that as a drawback of not running the tests often enough, but that might just be me... ;) Cheers, Ilja
messageBody:
junit@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> Yes, Hansel worked very well for us at the individual test
> level, within Eclipse. The major drawback that we had was
> that the results were included with the actual test results.
> So, when we looked at our overall test results (from our
> nightlybuild) it was difficult to easily see what failures
> were due to code, and which were just due to lack of coverage
> (had to dig into each package and class).

I'd rather see that as a drawback of not running the tests often enough, but
that might just be me... ;)

Cheers, Ilja
